63800.summary: Some customers in the Heritage area of Prince George are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63800.title: July 10 - Prince George (Heritage) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
63796.summary: Some customers in the Silverwood Heights area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
